name: Cube Shooter 31
description:
** CUBE SHOOTER 31 **

CUBE SHOOTER 31 is a MULTIPLAYER ARCADE CUBE SHOOTER with TWO exciting game mode!

CLASSIC: destroy all black cubes!

TIME: how long can you survive without shooting?

But this is not all! Gather 3 friends and play together on a single keyboard!

** HOW TO PLAY **

Player 1

Thrust: UP

Rotate Left: LEFT

Rotate Right: RIGHT

Fire: DOWN

Player 2

Thrust: W

Rotate Left: A

Rotate Right: D

Fire: S

Player 3

Thrust: I

Rotate Left: J

Rotate Right: L

Fire: RIGHT K

Player 4

Thrust: 8

Rotate Left: 4

Rotate Right: 6

Fire: 5

Pass on fallen allies spawn point to revive them

** CREDITS **

Created by Luca Andrea Raho and Andrea Sgarro

Music composed by Robert del Naja

Font Visitor created by Brian Kent

Special Thanks to Cristian Urbini and Valentina Zanasi

Made with Unity

Ludum Dare 31 Submission
